column5: SUMMER SPECIAL! WATERFRONT! ENJOY THE TEXAS SUMMER WEATHER IN THE BEST HOME & LOCATION ON THE LAKE! THIS IS A PRIVATE LARGE SINGLE STORY 4 BEDROOM HOME ON LAKE CONROE WITH ISLAND IN VIEW AND AN INDOOR POOL/HOT TUB! BRING YOUR BOAT!! SIDEWALK DOWN TO THE DOCK AND WATER FRONT! ORIGINALLY BUILT FOR A HANDICAPPED INDIVIDUAL SO IT HAS THOSE FEATURES. HOME NESTLED ON ABOUT A HALF ACRE OF TREES! ONE OF ONLY 13 HOMES THAT ACTUALLY BORDER THE LAKE IN THE SUBDIVISON! Note about boats:Ask special details
column8: INDOOR POOL/HOT TUB! WATERFRONT SUMMER SPECIAL!
